data.intro:
Hey there :wave: I'm PS Bot. :robot_face: The Product Support Team's little helper.
Let me show you a few simple `/` commands that will help you find what you are looking for. As if by magic... :sparkles:
data.commands:
`/ps_help_commands`: I will show you all of the available slash commands

`/ps_channel_guidelines`: I will show you the #product-support channel guidelines

`/ps_trouble_shooting`: I will help you troubleshoot browser and app issues

`/ps_useful_links`: I will show you a list of super handy links
data.instructions:
:one: Open PS Bot from the Apps section of slack

:two: Type `/` followed by the name of the command you would like to use

:three: Hit the enter key

:four: Follow the on screen instructions to help me, help you :tada:
